title: Premium Bug Tracking Dashboard
description: Enterprise bug tracking and issue management system with advanced workflow automation, team collaboration, priority management, release tracking, and comprehensive project analytics.

generation_hints.color_usage: Use danger for critical bugs, warning for high priority, success for resolved
generation_hints.performance: Optimize list rendering, use virtualization for large bug lists
generation_hints.layout_priority: Bug overview and priority matrix should be prominently displayed
generation_hints.user_flow: Quick bug creation, easy status updates, clear priority indication
